  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:merli.xtec.cat:merli/3389</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>MERLI</catalog>
            <entry>merli/3389</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="ca">La casa</string>
            <string language="en">The house</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das Haus</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La maison</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A casa</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La casa</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το σπίτι</string>
          </title>
          <language>ca</language>
          <language>en</language>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">Casa amb cinc estances (el bany, l'habitació, la cuina, la sala d'estar i el jardí), amb el vocabulari (àudio i escrit) dels objectes més usuals. 
Idiomes: català, anglès i castellà.</string>
            <string language="en">House with five areas (bathroom, bedroom, kitchen, sitting room and garden), and the names (aural and written) of the most usual objects in Catalan, English and Spanish.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">objectes</string>
            <string language="en">commonly used object</string>
            <string language="es">objetos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">organització</string>
            <string language="en">organisation</string>
            <string language="es">organización</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">raonament</string>
            <string language="en">reasoning</string>
            <string language="es">razonamiento</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">vocabulari</string>
            <string language="en">vocabulary</string>
            <string language="es">vocabulario</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Haus mit fünf Bereichen (Badezimmer, 
Schlafzimmer, Küche, Sittingraum und Garten) und die Namen (aural und
geschrieben) der üblichsten Nachrichten auf katalanisch, Englisch und
spanisch.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Chambre avec cinq zones (salle de bains, chambre 
à coucher, cuisine, salon et jardin), et les noms (auditifs et 
écrits) des objets les plus habituels dans le catalan, l'anglais et 
l'Espagnol.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Casa com cinco áreas (banheiro, bedroom, cozinha,
quarto de assento e jardim), e os nomes (aural e escritos) dos objetos
os mais usuais no catalan, no inglês e no espanhol.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Camera con cinque zone (stanza da bagno, camera da
letto, cucina, stanza di seduta e giardino) ed i nomi (sonori e 
scritti) degli oggetti più usuali nel catalan, nell'inglese e nello 
Spagnolo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σπίτι με πέντε περιοχές (λουτρό, κρεβατοκάμαρα, 
κουζίνα, δωμάτιο καθίσματος και κήπος), και τα ονόματα 
(ακουστικά και γραπτά) των πιό συνηθισμένων αντικειμένων στα 
καταλανικά, αγγλικά και ισπανικά.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">geläufig benutzte Nachricht</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Organisation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Argumentation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wortschatz</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">objet généralement utilisé</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">organisation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">raisonnement</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">vocabulaire</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">objeto geralmente usado</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">organização</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">raciocínio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">vocabulário</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">oggetto comunemente usato</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">organizzazione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">ragionamento</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">vocabolario</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">συνήθως χρησιμοποιημένο αντικείμενο</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">οργάνωση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">συλλογισμός</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">λεξιλόγιο</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
